TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Jerry_Bird, title = Jerry_Bird, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerry_Bird} }

S.FORM: Jerry Bird nalecuhan i Corbin, Kentucky, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Jerry Bird i 1956 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 18, namapili' tu nu Minneapolis Lakers putiput. 2 bulad 3 demiad, 1934 a mihca, Jerry Bird, miunduay. (mapatay i 2017 a mihca) u canan ku NBA kanatal kanas-mali putiput, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapuyu'en NBA, u Amis-Amilika tatama syubay kanas-mali putiput. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tusa a subal, sawaliyan atu satipan. cacay subal izaw tulu a cu, cacay a cu izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, u zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syubay kanas-mali nisakaput sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakaput sasasedsed", sapuyu'en "Amilika syubay kanas", acasa kakelul han NBA.

Jerry Bird nalecohan i Corbin, Kentocky, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Jerry Bird i 1956 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ko owac ato silsil 18, namapili' to no Minneapolis Lakers potipot. 2 bolad 3 demiad, 1934 a mihca, Jerry Bird, miondoay. (mapatay i 2017 a mihca) o canan ko NBA kanatal kanas-mali potipot, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapoyo'en NBA, o Amis-Amilika tatama syobay kanas-mali potipot. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tosa a sobal, sawaliyan ato satipan. cacay sobal izaw tolo a co, cacay a co izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, o zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syobay kanas-mali nisakapot sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakapot sasasedsed", sapoyo'en "Amilika syobay kanas", acasa kakelol han NBA.
